title: Pak Mission in Bangladesh in contact with students: Spokesperson
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 20 (APP): Pakistan’s mission in Dhaka, Bangladesh was in contact with all the Pakistani students who were safe and accommodated at safe locations.
“DHM has visited Chittagong to meet the students there as well. All students are safe,” the Foreign Office spokesperson on Saturday posted on X account.
The High Commission had accommodated students at safe locations which included the High Commission premises, Ambassador’s residence and some other safe locations, it was further added.
